item.title: LyonHacks Season II
item.description: #chapter p { font-size: 1.05rem !important; line-height: 1.6rem !important; } Virtual Hackathon | Coming to Ontario on April 15th, 2022Interested? Sign up! let update = () = { let date = new Date("April 7 2022 23:59:00 EST").getTime(); let countdown = document.getElementById("countdown"); let curr = new Date().getTime(); let until = date - curr; if(until About LyonHacks Welcome to LyonHacks II, a 48-hour hackathon! LyonHacks II will start on April 15th at noon and will end on April 17th at noon.
